original_text:
For the Lord will vindicate his people
    and have compassion on his servants,
when he sees that their power is gone
    and there is none remaining, bond or free.
korean_text: 참으로 여호와께서 자기 백성을 판단하시고 그 종들을 불쌍히 여기시리니 곧 그들의 무력함과 갇힌 자나 놓인 자가 없음을 보시는 때에로다

sentences.original_text: For the Lord will vindicate his people
and have compassion on his servants
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 자기 종들에게 긍휼을 베푸실 것이며

sentences.original_text: when he sees that their power is gone
